attributes.description:
This is an extended version of episode 1 with some differently cut scenes - 55m24s length
The regular Amazon streaming version for this episode is 50m4s (DEFLATE release for example)

Notes from release group:
 [i]"This is the original pilot released during Pilot Season 2015, not the final edit of S01E01. Direct stream d/l from Amazon. No reencoding. REPACK due to incomplete file last time."   [/i]                           

Screenshots:

attributes.description:
Good.Girls.Revolt.S01.1080p.WEBRip.x264-DEFLATE
10 episodes
1080p x264 video, DD+ 5.1 audio, english subs
I would imagine these are encodes from the 2160p stream because they are very crisp (more detail than the regular 1080p WEB-DL)
